segments.text: The water gushing over the sink edge is disgusting, just soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor looks filthy, spreading like a stain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, and she doesn't even flinch—gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids grabbing cookies with who knows what on their hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting, probably dirty from the floor too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets collecting dust or crumbs inside, ugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plates stacked on the counter might get splashed with that mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron will be soaked soon, what a nasty surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the window curtains might get damp from the spray.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is turning the kitchen into a swamp—revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy holding a plate like a lid, probably dropping crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand how unclean it's getting so fast.
segments.speaker: PAR
